document.full_text: toshiba's main facility producing flash memory used in tablets and smartphones has resumed production after the japanese earthquake and chip prices could rise due to the setback and logistic problems.
document.title: toshiba partner says chip production resumes
lines_and_colors: toshiba's main facility producing flash memory used in tablets and smartphones has resumed production after the japanese earthquake and chip prices could rise due to the setback and logistic problems.
